1111.content:
You were running, the ground quakes as you run. Something massive was behind you and is very close behind.

"Where are you, human?" A loud female voice can be heard in the heavens as ypu run in the the jungle. You continue to run in a strange jungle like area with no since of direction. The earthquakes seem to calm down a little, making you stop for a little. The was a mistake.

*Booom!!*

A strong force launch you on your face. You look up in fear to see a massive fur covered wall. The wall was none other than a foot of a titan size anthro, standing above you.

"There you are." You heard as you look up to see two cruise ship size finger pinch your body and lifts you up to the sky. You struggle, only your struggles are fruitless as you hear a thunderous giggle next to you.

"So this is a human." You look and see a giant green pupil of that of a giant anthro bat girl. If you could look at her from far away, you would see that she appears tp be around your age, wears a long dress, and has glass.

You tremble in fear as the girl examines you closely.

"Tee hee, i think i will take you home...."

"I think I will take you home as a pet...hehehe..." The massive bat giggles out loud while she is still holding you in between fingers. You couldn't believe a bat is taking you home as a pet. You wanted to say things to the girl but you don't know what she is capable of doing though and that you decide to keep in silence.

"You'll be my first human pet I came across on this earth. Now let's get you home little boy. hehehe..." The bat smiled and carried to her home. You had nothing to say unless the goddess decide that you speak for her. As she is walking home...

11112.content:
"an experiment!?" you're eyes widen in horror as the warning bells were already in full overdrive in your head. Hearing horror stories about these massive animals, the usual outcome for captured humans were rather...terrible to say anything else. rumors spreading about terrible experiments such as dissection or even crushing tests fill your head with terrifying images as you frantically begin to squirm once more. "Let me go!" you try to shout in desperation, only to have your words fall flat as the huge bat girl simply giggles and place you down on her empty free hand.

"Now stay put there alright?" she says while wiggling her finger like a scolding parent. "I wouldn't want you to fall off or something like that." She urges as you nervously turn your head towards the side of her palm. Due to her extremely massive size it seemed virtually impossible to get a clear look down her hand, but on the other hand, you weren't so thrilled to see just how many stories you were high up in the air. As you slowly try to position yourself helplessly upon the middle of the batgirl's hand, you soon feel a large tremor emerge below you.

Quickly bracing from the sudden motion, you immediately gaze upwards to notice her walk her way down the densely wooded area. After what seemed like a couple minutes or so, you soon feel her freeze in place as you both were before-
11112.title: For a experiment I'm having

As days, go on, you been avoiding contact to them since you don't know if they are mean or nice to tiny humans. As you were walking, you happened to be at...

11121.content:
You’d shrunk in high school of all places. “Oh, great!” You slapped your forehead frustrated. “Of all the places.” You thought as you walked around and spotted a group of humans running in the distance.

“Hey!” You waves at them. They all stopped to look at you but the second they stop a massive paw slammed down on them.

You fell on your rump in fear looking up at the grinning face of husky anthro! It appeared to be male judging from the build.

“Stupid bugs.” He muttered. You didn’t waist time in running away but found you ended up running between another anthros toes.

It’s fur tangled around you like rope. “Sir are you sure they were bugs?” A female vixen asked the husky.

“Yes what else could they be?” The husky shrugged and walked away. The vixen just sighed and went on her way unaware of your presence.

The smell between the vixen toes wasn’t bad but not very pleasant either. You hope this nightmare would be over when the vixen reached.
11121.title: High school

111223.content:
You were currently on top of your bed looking for food. You’d looked everywhere downstairs but found nothing.

“God, is this over grown lizard a clean freak or what!” You shouted angry that you couldn’t find any food on the bed either.

The new owner of your house was a red scaled dragoness. You didn’t really know much about her except that she isn’t cruel to humans. As long as your not stealing from her.

For example she gave some food to a human family and several other because they were starving. However this one guy tried to take advantage of her kindness and ended up getting turned into a stain beneath her foot.

Thump thump thump

You gulped knowing that something big was behind you. Quickly you turned around and was greated by the sight of two red scaled moons.

It was the dragonesses butt. It looked like she had just gotten out of a shower and was preparing to sit!

“W-Wait.” You said not loud enough for her to hear.

Whump!

The unaware dragoness sat down pinning you beneath her butt. Fortunately you were trapping her buttcrack so you weren’t squished just stuck.

“Great now what.” You groaned
111223.title: Bedroom

choices: This was all a dream and you wake up to a new reality
1113.content:
You are living in the same city you grew up in, but now it is so immense it boggles the mind. You were on the street when it happened a few days ago and slowly well over a hundred people grouped together under a street vendor cart for shelter. No one has any clothes. No one has any technology or tools, just bare naked people huddling together under the only shelter avialable. The first threat to come is the pigeons. A massive light blue aircraft sized bird swoops down and takes a lady in it's beak and swallows her like it would any bug or bread crumb. The massive bird then hops forward to a guy trying to hide behind a candy wrapper and he too is snatched up and swallowed alive by the massive pigeon. Then the pigeon flies away spooked by what comes next... Six giants wearing light gray uniforms come down the street with weapons at the ready, but nothing to shoot.

The leader has the head of a wolf and massive leather boots indicating that his feet look too big for his body. He waves for the others to check buildings. Three of them wear helmets and their faces cannot be seen, but the SHAPE of their head is elongated... Not human in shape at all. The second in command is definitely a female with HUGE breasts as big as her head and a furry animal face. It's not a familiar animal face though, but a dark brown fur covers her cheeks and she is wearing magnification goggles scanning around. She focuses in on you and the dozens of people hiding under the cart.

"It seems to have worked flawlessly sir, I am picking up heat signatures there... It's the enemy. They've been reduced to a perfect scale. They won't be a problem," the female furry reports to her leader. The wolf comes forward and takes a look for himself and scans under the cart at all of you bug sized people and grins. IF a wolf could grin. You just see fangs. "Signal to the ship that the plan was a success," He waved to the female. She began talking on her wrist band radio.

"Sir, what do we do with the natives?" the female asked. The wolf stood to his full height looking very proud of this triumph.

"We don't have to do anything, let the vermin live in fear in the dark corners. We know how they treat our kind! Like... like... Animals! We shall return the favor," he sneers and starts to walk back the way they came. Off in the distance, a small van sized shuttle had landed with the soldiers inside. The others gathered to join their leader heading back to the shuttle. The massive unidentified female anthro looks down at all of you again and takes a small platic cup from her belt.

What do you do?
1113.title: Adult

You push your legs to their limit to try to get away as fast as you can! Although in your heart you know that it's no contest!
Do you wait to be taken or try your best to find a safety spot?

1122.content:
Molly was your average 14 year old girl. She loved animals and walks down the canal. That was until the shrinking occurred. She was out in the town square, shopping with her friends one second, then she was half an inch tall the next. She glanced around, unable to see her friends in the distance. As the now colossal anthros landed, she heard screams. However, she was far too afraid to do anything of the sort.

For the past week, she'd been surviving in the town square, eating discarded rubbish and avoiding the paws and hooves of the titanic animal-people. They seemed to be just like humans were, only having characteristics of animals as well as humans.

Now was day 8 of the ginger girl's new life. She emerged from the cracks between the cobbles, her blue eyes wide as she examined the square. It was beginning to fill with titans already, so she'd need to be careful. Adjusting her dirty clothes, she decided to go in the direction of the ____.
1122.title: Molly the Tiny Teen

choices: Follow Vixie and the tribe as they look for a new tunneling ground
Jane calls the pet store and gets a human cage, keeping Vixie and tribe as pets
1123.content:
Vixie was born after the wave, when mankind is said to have been like the great gods that tower over humanity. To be honest, she didn't believe the stories of the elders, mankind was always at the bottom of the food chain, and she wasn't so naive as to believe the myths thought up by the ancestors to explain their role in life. Never mind that her grandmother insists that she remembers living in the hall of the gods, not as a part of an expedition, but as the owners. And wearing the robes of the gods too! Because of their small size, and scarcity of usable resources, clothing was an entirely forgotten concept by the isolated pockets of humanity that existed.

"What does she know, the wrinkly old hag." Vixie mutters to herself, rolling a wild strawberry alongside her sister, Vera, the wild berries were the only ones they could really move without being noticed, and they were often as big as a person.

THOOOM

Vixie and Vera looked over, seeing the rapidly approaching feet of one of the gods, and abandoned the berry, running for the safety of the bushes, but their presence was ignored by the massive rabbit-lady, who was busy getting her hose out to water her garden.

"We've got to warn the tribe!" Vixie yelled, sprinting as fast as she could to the burrows, "The goddess brings rain!"

Their tiny naked bodies wormed their way down tunnels, shouting for everyone to get out, grabbing the younger tribesmates and forcing them to the surface, rapid thumping of the rain making everyone hurry. Once Vixie was sure they'd gotten everyone, she clambered up the base of the bush, nestling in a crook between two twigs, enduring the massive raindrops that threatened to drown anyone, or knock down any who got hit by them.

Once the rains were over, the tribe took account of who survived, and Vixie noted that her grandmother hadn't made it, and most of her sisters and cousins did. But life was cheap at this size, and fertile females were a prime commodity, so the tribe decided to cut their losses and move closer to the hall of the gods, seeing as the goddess didn't bring rain so regularly the closer to the structure they got.

Not even offering lip service to the dead, the miniscule tribe grabbed their spears (thorns) and began their trek to the new tunneling grounds. Vixie looking up at the goddess as she removed her massive vegetables from the ground, tearing up the area they had called home for the last four months, ripping the earth asunder as though it were nothing.

==================

Meanwhile, Jane Lapine was enjoying her gardening, but noticed something off about the soil, it appeared to have been tunneled by something. Too big for worms, too small for any burrowing mammal except....humans! She looked around quickly and eagerly, she'd only read about the former owners of Ert, such a strange name the humans gave this world, she thought.

Despite looking extremely hard and thoroughly, all she found were some dead humans, "Awww. They must've drowned..." She may agree that humans were not particularly intelligent, or clean, but some human keepers did discover that humans evacuated their tunnels whenever they felt threatened, those that didn't, often died. And no matter how filthy or a pest it was, Jane hated to see an innocent animal die so lonely, not to mention, she did find them to be fascinating to watch and learn about.

"Wait! I have an idea!" And she ran back inside to pick up her phone and make a call.
1123.title: Adult

11231.content:
Vixie looked around at the massive bushes and plants around her and sighed, as much as she was saddened by the loss of life because of the goddess, she liked the last spot they'd dug their burrow. The ground was soft and it was relatively free of other, bigger animals, which was a must for her tribe to survive.

"The ground here looks like it has clay in it." She heard a cousin say somewhere in the caravan. "That means we could build a burrow that is waterproof, and the goddess doesn't seem to bother this land."

Vixie helped to get the younger ones situated while the adults began scraping and digging away st the clay filled dirt. Looking around for her sister, she saw her helping to dig out an entrance while one of the men from another tribe that had joined some weeks ago was mounting her. Deciding to talk to her sister, she headed over.

"Hey Vera."

**pant**pant** "Hey Vixie. How's it gooooing?" Vera and the man didn't stop their rutting, modesty and concepts of privacy died out years ago.

Vixie started digging the tunnel entrance further down, gently lifting her rear into the air, she needed a good rut, and new tribesmates were needed. "Alright." She felt someone's legs getting into position behind her, and she gently bent her torso a bit lower, "Pity about grandmother, ri-i-i-ight?" The last word came out stuttered as the man rutting her was a bit forceful on his thrusts.

Vera bobbed her head side to side, starting a tunnel branching off from the entrance they were digging, "Eh, only the youngest really listened to her stories anymore. They were just too obvious about being made up. Aaaah, aaaahhh, AAAAHH" The male rutting Vera had finished by now, and stumbled away, Vixie noting that her man seemed to be taking forever to wrap up.

"Yeah, but she still helped teach us stuff. Like how to hide, or find foooooOOOOOOODDD!" Nevermind then, Vixie smiled back at the tanned man behind her, wiggling her rear in the air again toward him a second he left, inviting him to return later.

Vera nodded as Vixie came over and the two began to work in tandem with the other tribes mates in connecting the new tunnels, surface guides helped the diggers to line up properly. "Be that as it may, how do you explain the goddess? How do you predict the behavior of the divine? Perhaps the goddess decided that it was simply time for her to die."

Vixie said nothing. She knew better than to question the divinity of the goddess, who else among them could tear the earth apart, shake the ground just by walking, or decide when to bring rain and death? But for some reason, she just couldn't help but feel like there was more got their goddess than the stories and beliefs told.

==================

"That'll be 38 sqol ma'am." A hedgehog man said as he unloaded several boxes to Ms. Jane Lapine, looking at the labels, he saw that there were human keepin supplies in each. But whatever, not his problem.

"Here you go!" Jane said as she handed over the money, "I hope this doesn't take too long to setup..."

The delivery man shrugged his shoulders, "Just follow the instructions, everything will work out, otherwise your warranty is void."

Jane nodded, watching as he got into his van and drove away, "Alright, time to get setup!"

12.title: 1/10 of an inch

121.content:
It happened without warning one day...

Some people had been at home sleeping, some were simply going about their business... But the change occurred to all of them simultaneously. It didn't matter if it was day or night where you lived... Suddenly the sky lit up with a bright green flash. And then the world was eerily silent. In a single instant everyone in the world seemed to have disappeared. Piles of empty clothing laid about the streets and in homes, the owners of said clothes seemingly gone.

Slowly what remains of humanity emerged... They hadn't quite disappeared... But unless one looked carefully they might as well have. Tiny almost invisible specks emerged from the empty pile of clothes. The bright green flash that had enveloped the world had shrunk every human in existence down to an insignificant little speck. The average height of an adult human was now 1/10th an inch... Or about 2.5 millimeters. This left the human race roughly the same size as fleas.

It wasn't long before the cause of the shrinking appeared. Animals that could walk on two legs and spoke soon appeared. They came to Earth in giant ships and quickly took over. They moved into the now seemingly abandoned human homes and started their own lives.

Tiny and naked the humans were helpless to fight back. They weren't big enough to use tools. They weren't even big enough to use tools! The humans could have been wiped out in an instant if the animals wished. In that respect their new size was something of a small mercy. Humans were so small they were beneath the notice of many of the animals. This allowed them to survive living on the fringe of the animal society scavenging what they could for food.

As for the civilized animals... Some saw humans as inconsequential... Others saw them as pests. Some saw them as curiosities... And others yet might consider them possible pets.

The world is a tough place to be now. Not only must the flea sized humans deal with the giant animals... But a world that is massive where now even the smallest animals represent huge threats.

One of the people to live in this world is you.

You are...
121.title: Male

choices: Try to get the wolf's attention
1211.content:
One moment you were walking to get lunch on your break and everything was fine... Then there was a bright green flash and you were suddenly lost in your own clothing. It took a few minutes to register what had happened. At first you thought your clothes had been stolen and you must have just been wrapped up in some kind of giant sack. However as you crawled for safety the truth soon became apparent. Your clothes piled as large as the pyramids of Egypt behind you were a bit of a clue. You had somehow shrunk! Now no bigger than a flea you stood on the sidewalk with no idea what you were to do.

The sidewalk itself was now treacherous domain. Small cracks within it were now seemingly bottomless ravines. You had only walked about five minutes from your workplace but now you were an eternity away from anywhere safe. Surrounded by cracks in the sidewalk you seemed to be stuck with no hope of escape. You considered maybe climbing over clothes... It would take forever but at least the threads would give you ample handholds and you'd no longer be stuck on the sidewalk. You weren't sure where you'd go from there but it seemed better than anything else.

You started your climb... When suddenly the entire Earth began to shake. You reached the top of your clothes piles and you were able to see part of what was happening. Strange metal items were falling from the sky. They were spherical... And each one might as well have been the size of the moon in comparison to you. If any of them landed anywhere near you there would be no outrunning it. You would simply be gone. You could do nothing but watch helplessly as they came down.

You could see where one of the spheres landed. A slot opened up on it and what could best be described as an animal walking on its hind legs emerged from it. It looked like a wolf. It began to stride in your direction not taking any sight of you. Massive brown paws worked their way towards you... You realized that the wolf may not even notice you. You had no idea if they were responsible or not... Being shrunk and humanoid animals from space were a bit more than you could handle... But you did know it would be really bad if that wolf stepped on you. He wouldn't step on the pile of clothes right? That was the safest place to be right?

Or... Maybe not. Maybe you should run for it. Or maybe you should try to get the wolf's attention. Regardless of if it was related to your shrinking or not you couldn't do much on your own right now!
1211.title: An adult

choices: You find your friends who are also shrunk
Your find your friends... but an anthro found them first
1212.content:
You were just a young boy when the shrinking happened. You were nine years old and in third grade. You and your friends were out on the playground when suddenly you saw a bright green flash light up the sky. The next thing you knew... You were naked and stuck underneath some kind of giant blanket. You looked around for your clothes in confusion as this happened... You were more worried about getting in trouble if a teacher saw you naked than anything else as you hadn't quite realized what was going on.

Crawling around you eventually found your way out from the 'blanket.' You emerged into a world of enormous blades of grass that reached upward like skyscrapers. You couldn't see beyond the grass to see the school or anything else. You slowly turned around and saw the fabric you had been stuck underneath. It was your own shirt you had been wearing just moments ago! It was like a giant mountain of clothing now though! You couldn't wear that anymore. You looked down at yourself feeling somewhat self conscious there... But the feeling passed as you marveled as the giant world.

You had no idea what had happened or how you had gotten so small... You didn't know if it had happened to just you, or everyone else in your class as well. Where were your friends you had been playing with before this?

And of course... You also didn't know about the invading humanoid animals yet.

Well... It was scary... But it was kind of cool to be so small. There were lots of games you might be able to come up with! But that was if you found your friends... You supposed you should go looking for them!
1212.title: A child

choices: She starts leave and you try to follow her
She looks down and spots you
You ran like a coward and abandon your friends.
12122.content:
You look around for quite a while until you heard shouting in the distant. You recognize the shouting as they were you friends and try to find them. You turn the corner of a nearby bottle cap and saw your friends, and they appeared to be running from something. Before you could something. You felt a strong earthquake and another one until the area grew very dark. You look in time to witness something massive land right next to you. You look up in fear as something gigantic towers over you like a mountain. Turns out, this thing that stands like a mountain is a paw, a paw that belong to a anthro female fox. You look up high above and see the massive fox looking down at the ground. She doesn't seem to notice you yet, but she did spot your friends. She raise her foot and stomps right next to them to block their path. She then pulls out a small jar and twizzers and squats down. She plucks your friends one by one before standing at her full height.

"Command, this is recon, the operation seems successful. All alien life has reduce in size in this section." She says as she talks to a alien looking phone.

"Good, head back your ship for the time being." Another female voice could be heard.

"And the inhabitants?"

"Stomp, eat, heck, shrink them further if you want, we don't need to worry about them once the other recon has confirm they finish." The other voice says before ending their conversation. The fox looks at the kids in the small container before deciding she might have some fun with them when she heads to her ship.

Down below, all you did was watch in fear as the fox is about to leave.
12122.title: Your find your friends... but an anthro found t...

choices: A family of rabbit anthros: a mother, daughter and father.
A family of wolf anthros: two mothers and a son.
1222.content:
Lilly was a few millimeters tall upon her desk, it had been like this for the past three days, and she'd heard nothing. Unable to get off of the desk, she'd just assumed that something had happened to her house, and not the entire planet. She was yet to see an anthro.

She stood on a fine porcelain plate, having needed to stay near her only food source. When S-Day had happened, she was studying, hunched over her desk with a half-eaten sandwich on the plate next to her. The bread on the bottom slice of her old sandwich was all she'd eaten, her insect-sized body unable to reach the lettuce or tomato further up.

Though the tiny brunette was getting tired of bread. And thus, she decided to clamber off of the plate and try and find something. She got to the edge of the plate and looked down, that was a long, long way. There was nothing else for her to do, though, so it'd be worth a leap of faith, right? Closing her eyes, Lilly hopped off the end of the plate, feeling the air rush past her for a few seconds, before the ground hit her. She expected to be in great pain, but there was nothing, the fall didn't hurt at all.
All things considered, she was having quite an easy time.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------

Her similarly bug-sized parents, however, weren't having such a good time. They were both separated, her father on the carpet before the door, and her mother on the couch. There was no food anywhere, and they hadn't eaten since before S-Day.Things didn't seem like they could get worse, but they were bound to. There was a click as the large door opened, three figures entering.
1222.title: A Tiny Teen

choices: To have a sit down, the walk here was exhausting.
Upstairs, maybe there's some cool things there.
12221.content:
"Oh, I can't believe we finally found a home, in such a beautiful place too," The snowy white mother spoke, her ears flopping forwards as she entered with a suitcase. Lilly's own mother didn't stand a chance as the enormous paws approached, her tiny form was pressed down by the woman's left paw, and not even a second later, she'd popped under the sole, a tiny red blotch being left. Inside next, was Catherine, the daughter, with similar white fur and bright blue eyes. She looked around in wonder.
"This place has nice houses, doesn't it?" She smiled, unknowingly walking over the blotch as she passed her mother. From outside, came a call: "Diane, are you coming to help unpack?"

"Yep, just give me a second!" The mother, Diane, called back, she set her luggage down and turned to leave, "Cathy, just have an explore, I bet the house has other nice things in it,"

"Will do," Cathy chirped, setting her own suitcase down next to her mother's.

Where does she go first?
12221.title: Of Bunnies and Bugs

14.title: Possibly smaller

141.content:
In a quaint little cul de sac, the newly arrived anthros were movingly in their stuff, removing the previous occupants clothing, pictures, papers, anything they didn't want or need. In one particular house, there had been a party going on when the shrinking began, fortunately the partygoers had been able to gather together for survival. Unfortunately they had shrunk so small that even dust mites ignored them, not even noticing them as they hopped on for free rides.

Living in the massive carpet forest around them, the shrunken party goers eeked out a living as best they could, some went insane from being so small, others acted like it had always been this way. The tiny campground that was the beginnings of small scale civilization scavenged from the dead microorganisms that called the carpet home. It did take a while before the people got used to going about naked, as their clothes didn't shrink with them, but they managed.

Who are you?
141.title: 1/1000 of an inch

It's been several days ever since the "great shrink" and you have hiding within the walls of your own home..or what used to be your home. You have been shrunken to 1/100 millimeter tall by those invaders and have been hiding from their sights in order to avoid danger; having no idea what happens if they caught any sight of you. So far so good, it seems that they have no idea that they are still human among them since they believe that they eliminated them all once they shrunk them.

By the way, are you male or female?

To be quite honest, you haven't even learn who is living here in your former home even though you occasionally hear voices from outside your little shelter.

The owner appeared to be a doe, from the looks of a picture from miles, to you, away. From the looks of it, she appears to be living by herself. You can't see much about the doe appearance, and you kind of don't want to at this second as your primary focus is getting food. Looking across the plain of the floor, you see crumbs, small traces of berries, and some other types of vegetables. Unfortantly, all appeared to be in the direct middle of the floor. It would be easy to get to the food, but it woukd be risky should the new owner come by. Unfortunately, its a risk you'll have to take if you want to live.

Making sure the area is clear, you ran as fast as you could to the food. It took what felt like forever just to get to the nearest crumb. Eventually you made it...
14211.title: The owner is a lone doe

You quickly shut your eyes and pray that you can survive this nightmarish trip.

'I'm I still alive' you thought. You felt the ground to be soft and cushiony but it smelled dusty; good thing you're not allergic to dust. You slowly opened your eyes and found out that you were on top of a colossal sofa. Looking at the room beyond, you're finally able to see these giant anthros' features:

They all look to be about 19-24 years of age, most likely in their early 20s. The doe who now lives in your home has redish and white fur, brown hair, and green eyes. She is wearing a yellow shirt and blue shorts. The horse has brown fur, long blond hair that is tied in a ponytail (no pun indeed) and blue eyes. She wears a blue and yellow sleeveless top, white jeans tied by a black belt with a gold buckle, a shiny gold necklace, and a pair of sky blue high heels. The wolf has gray and white fur, black hair and eyes. She wears a red hoodie with big white letters that spelled "Super", blue jeans, and a pair of white sneakers. The cat has orange fur with stripes, black bobcut styled hair, and hazel eyes. She wears a purple midriff-baring tube top, black shorts, and a pair of brown boots. The squirrel has brown and white fur, red hair with a green headband, and gray eyes behind her glasses. She wears a red and yellow striped shirt, a brown skirt, and a pair of black flats (the exact same ones that almost stepped on you!). The goat has golden fur, brunette hair tied into pigtails by a pair of green ribbons, and blue eyes. She wears a orange, midriff-baring shirt with a sun on it, blue denim skirt that is tied up in a brown belt with a black buckle and a pair of brown cowgirl styled boots. And finally, the peacock has blue feathers, long straight black hair, black eyes that were painted in blueish eye shadows, and a small red bindi on her forehead, almost giving her a Hindu look. She wears a white dress with puffy sleeves and is tied by a belt in the same color the horse has but instead of a gold buckle it has a gray one instead. She also wears a pair of golden high heeled sandals. You look at of these six giantesses and surprised that not only they look human but act like them too.

You look up to see a enormous window above you which was slightly opened. You could just go outside and escape but unfortunately it seemed to be impossible right now. You sat there and decided to give up when suddenly you heard a noise coming from outside. You looked back to the window to see what looked like a.......tiny aircraft? It's true, it was in fact little aircraft about your size coming through the open window. You watch as it landed on the window's edge and stood there for a while. Could there be other tiny people such as yourself?

Suddenly, a periscope pops out of the craft and pointed right towards the giant anthros. You don't even know what's going on, should go and check it out?

1432.content:
A young girl peered at the screen in her father’s starship and squealed happily “Over there Daddy! Can I have that one? Ohh Pleasepleaseplease!!”

“But of course, dear. Anything for my little princess. Go to the airlock and get ready to put your hand out.” The doting father changed course slightly and entered a star system with nine planets. He grinned and settled his ship near a pair of worlds, fired a purple beam at the small grey one “Sweetie? A little bonus present for you!”

Her gloved hand reached out, a pair of fingers daintily pinched the small cratered grey ball and brought it in. She smiled at it and set it gently on the floor by her feet “Thank you Daddy!” she called “But now can I get the real pretty blue and green one??”

“Firing now, sweetheart.” The father announced, tolerantly. Again the purple ray hit its target, then his ship began moving “It should be floating along in about ten seconds.”

On Earth’s night side, the half of humanity who could witness it saw a purple haze surround the Moon and then, seemingly, the ancient companion seemed to slowly move away. Then the entire human race was engulfed in a purple light for several seconds. Once it faded, a simply ginormous spaceship seemed to pull up alongside the planet. First the sleek nose, then just mile after uncounted mile of vast metal wall. Just before the lights went out Someone in Alaska commented “That looks like a giant hand.”

“Almost, Daddy, just a liiiiiiiiittttle bit mooooore! Almost there!!!” the girl’s hand extended out the portal, as she reached for her new plaything. She bumped the blue-green ball with one gloved finger, then felt it roll into her palm. “It’s perfect Daddy! Just about the size of an apple!!” She closed her fingers around her prize, brought it into the ship, and smiled down at it admiringly, like what she was….a kid with a new toy.

Much of Humanity couldn’t see anything of the sky due to either monstrous fingers surrounding the planet, or the unbelievably gargantuan hand Earth was sitting in. What portion of the population who had a clear view, saw a smiling
1432.title: Earth Taken

info.brief_description: Alien anthros took over Earth by shrinking all humans to minuscule size.
info.description:
Everything was normal for Earth, until one day S-day happened, Shrink day. An race of alien Anthro decides to move some of their colonies to Earth, but instead of any debates or making demands to the people of earth, they choose to shrink every single human to such a small scale, bugs might be buildings or mountains to the human now.

Now with no native earthlings to stop them, the anthros made Earth their new home. However, humans are still alive somehow, but each second is a constant struggle, from giant bugs, the now massive weather disaster like a simple rain, to the now titan size anthro threatening to end their existence without knowing. You are one of these humans and must survive somehow. Will you survive? Who knows.

Rules: humans must be miniscule, no bigger than 1/2 of an inch, they can be smaller if you want. This is mostly a giantess interaction, giants are allowed, but please keep the interactions somewhat minimum.

No disgusting stuff like scat or pee, no futa, and try to not kill the character so quickly.

Other than that, have fun.
